utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: So, what package are you thinking?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Mm, this one comes with music and flowers. Oh, they even stream the whole thing live on the Internet.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Why would we want that?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: ‘Cause there’s a lot of gorgeous blondes out there who don’t believe they can land a short, nearsighted scientist. Let’s give them hope.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Whatever. Put us on the Internet. I’ve always wanted a wedding with a comment section.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: If you’re not into this, we can do it another time.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No. No, I want to. Look, we’ve put this off long enough. Let’s do it.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Aw. That’s exactly what you said the first time we slept together. Oh, excuse me. Sheldon. Hey.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Leonard, have you gotten married yet?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: No. Why?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Good. Don’t do it.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Some important new information has come to light. Women are the worst. I thought it was paper cuts, but I was wrong. No piece of paper ever cut me this deep.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: What happened now?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Amy has ended our relationship.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Oh, no. Seriously?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Amy broke up with Sheldon.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: She did?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Is Penny crying?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: No, of course not. They thrive on our suffering.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Buddy, I’m so sorry. Is there anything I can do?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Yes. If I ever talk about going out with a girl again, roll your eyes at me like I do to you when you say dumb things.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Sheldon, uh, okay, just because you’re going through this with Amy doesn’t mean that all women are bad.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Whatever.

utterance.speaker: Penny (on phone)
utterance.content: Hey, I just heard about you and Sheldon. Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Not really. Can you come over?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Uh, actually I’m in Vegas. Leonard and I are about to get married.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Hold on. You’re getting married and you didn’t invite me?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Well, it was kind of a spur-of-the-moment thing.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Wow. Hope I can catch the bouquet from here.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Amy, don’t be like that.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Why did I just hear Amy’s name?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Penny’s on the phone with her.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Did she say anything about me? Never mind. I don’t care. Well, if you care, you can find out and tell me. Just don’t be shocked when you find out that I don’t care.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Okay, will you relax? You’re not missing anything special.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: She’s upset. Look, it’s gonna be a great wedding. Look at you in your little suit.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Amy’s upset? Is it about me?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: No, I think it’s because we’re eloping.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Your marriage is causing her pain? Yeah, great, I take it back. Go ahead and do it. Yay for love.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Oh. What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: When last we spoke, you said you needed time.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Well, it’s only been 11 hours.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: The Lord of the Rings trilogy was nearly 11 hours. I made you watch that, you said it was an eternity.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Sheldon, when I’m ready to talk, I’ll let you know.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Very well. You seem to be headed somewhere. May I walk with you?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Boy, I’m glad we’re going out again.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: We’re not back together.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Why? Is there someone else? Just couldn’t wait for that first notch on your bedpost, could you?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: If you must know, I’m going to Howard and Bernadette’s to watch the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: And who’s this guy you’re taking?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: There’s no guy.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Oh, you’re going to a wedding alone? That’s sad.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: I’m not gonna be alone. I’ll be with my friends.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Your friends? Well, I think you mean my friends. And why wasn’t I invited to this?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Maybe because the two of us being there would make them feel awkward.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: We make everyone feel awkward. That’s our thing.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: They’re running a little behind. Should be pretty soon.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Hey, if you’re hungry, there’s a breakfast buffet at the strip club next door.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Thanks, but I don’t like glitter on my scrambled eggs.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I don’t think the strippers prepare the meal, but okay. Look, it’s not how I pictured it either, but I’m still glad we’re doing it.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Me, too.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: You sure?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: And you promise you’re okay with everything from the car?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh, my God, would you stop bringing it up?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: You’re right. I’m sorry. We have the rest of our lives to dredge stuff up from the past and fight about it. So what do you think? Should we run next door and grab a bite?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: What if they call our names?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Oh, don’t worry. They gave me this vibrating coaster.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh, and the fairy tale continues.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Thank you for doing this.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: Our pleasure. You feeling okay?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: We were together for so long, I honestly don’t know what I’m feeling.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Well, that’s understandable. You forgot. It’s called happy.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: Howard.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: I’m not saying anything bad. Just that she was in love with her captor and somehow managed to escape from his dark and crazy dungeon.

utterance.speaker: Stuart
utterance.content: I know what you’re going through. My, my, my last breakup was pretty tough.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Oh. What was her name?

utterance.speaker: Stuart
utterance.content: Hey, it’s a true story. I don’t need the third degree.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: For God’s sake, Sheldon, what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I didn’t want to come in. I was told it would make everyone feel uncomfortable. So I’ll just stay out here and pretend that I don’t have to go to the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: Howard, do something.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: I’m on it.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Sheldon, you being here might not be making things better.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I see. And is that why everybody was invited but me?

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: They didn’t invite everybody but you.Bernadette invited me, and Stuart lives here.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Who wants hot cinnamon rolls?

utterance.speaker: Official
utterance.content: So, when you hear the music, that’s your cue. Any questions?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Oh, the package that we paid for said the aisle was supposed to be strewn with rose petals.

utterance.speaker: Official
utterance.content: Where are the rose petals?!

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: You know what? It’s fine.

utterance.speaker: Female Voice
utterance.content: We can use the potpourri from the bathroom!

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Really, we’re good.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Yup, just want to get married.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Official
utterance.content: Great. I’ll see you two up there.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: This is it.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I love you.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I love you, too.

utterance.speaker: Female Voice
utterance.content: Was that a yes or no on the potpourri?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: We’re good.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Raj, you’re probably wondering why Amy and I aren’t showing any affection to one another.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Didn’t even crack the top ten.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well, you should know that she recently broke up with me.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: I said I needed time to think.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: I’m sure you guys will figure something out.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You hear that? Raj is devastated.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: Sheldon, shh. The wedding’s starting.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I see what’s happening. Sides are forming. Well, if Bernadette’s on Amy’s team, I pick Howard.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: I’m not taking sides.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Fine, I guess I’m stuck with Raj.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Stuart
utterance.content: At least you got picked.

utterance.speaker: Official
utterance.content: Before I go any further, have either of you prepared your own vows?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No. You wrote vows?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Well, I don’t have any. You’re kind of making me look bad.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: It’s okay. I don’t have to say them.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No, no, no, go ahead. I’ll come up with something mushy, you’ll cry, we got this.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Penny, we are made of particles that have existed since the moment the universe began. I like to think those atoms travelled 14 billion years through time and space to create us, so that we could be together and make each other whole.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Wow.

utterance.speaker: Official
utterance.content: Penny?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Right. Um, okay. Leonard, I mean, you’re not only the love of my life. I mean, you’re my best friend, and, you’ve got a friend in me. You got troubles. I got ’em, too. There isn’t anything I wouldn’t do for you. We stick together, and we can see it through, ’cause you’ve got a friend in me.

utterance.speaker: Official
utterance.content: Is that the song from Toy Story?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: He loves that movie.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I do.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: Aw, that was beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Yeah. I mean, not like our wedding beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: No, we totally won.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Amy, I don’t understand, are we broken up or not? It’s like you can’t make up your mind.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: It’s because you’re not giving me any space to think.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well, you should think fast, because men can sire offspring their entire lives, but those eggs you’re toting around have a sell-by date.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: You know what, Sheldon, you’ve made this really easy. You’re immature, you’re selfish, you just insulted me to my face. I don’t need any more time to think. We’re broken up.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: Amy.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Will someone take me home?

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Yeah. Come on, I’ll give you a ride.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: We did it.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Yeah, I’m so glad you guys could watch.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: We’ll say it was beautiful in the comment section.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: No, no, no. Hang on. I believe I’m supposed to carry you across the threshold.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Can you?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Who do you think carries Sheldon to bed when he falls asleep in front of the TV?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Okay, let’s do it. You gonna make it?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I’m okay.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Nicely done.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Thank you. Finally, there’s a Mrs. Hofstadter who isn’t disappointed in me.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Well, the night is still young.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Everything all right?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yeah. I guess.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Just tell me.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: It’s just, when we were kissing, I couldn’t help but picture you with that other girl.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Oh, no. No, come on. I have a friend in you. You said so.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: You’re right. Just forget it.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Yeah. Okay, listen. If you’re imagining that it was sexy, it wasn’t. We, we were both drunk, and she smelled like an ashtray. The boat was moving a lot, so I chipped her tooth.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Did you feel guilty?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: No, she had dental insurance.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Did you feel guilty after kissing her?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Yes. I felt guilty as soon as it happened. I feel guilty every time I see her.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: What do you mean, every time you see her?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: What do I mean? Boy, that’s a toughie.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: You still see her?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Well, no, not socially. But, you know, just at work.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: You work with her? How could you not tell me that?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I wanted to tell you in the car, but you told me to stop talking

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh, okay. So you’re saying this is my fault?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: No, of course not. Okay, look, instead of fighting, why don’t we dim the lights, um, get naked and make a baby? I was trying to lighten the mood. It’s not easy. You try it.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon (on phone)
utterance.content: Hello, Mother.

utterance.speaker: Mrs Cooper
utterance.content: Shelly! How’s my baby doing?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I just wanted to let you know that you can remove Amy from your nightly prayers. Unless you’re open to praying for a beehive to fall on her head.

utterance.speaker: Mrs Cooper
utterance.content: Oh, what’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: She broke up with me.

utterance.speaker: Mrs Cooper
utterance.content: Oh, Shelly.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: No, I’ll be okay. But I think that I’d like to send the ring back to you.

utterance.speaker: Mrs Cooper
utterance.content: Well, let’s not be hasty. Are you sure it’s over for good?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: It’s over for me. I’m done with women. Like when I swore off Pop Rocks. They both hurt you on purpose.

utterance.speaker: Mrs Cooper
utterance.content: You want to tell me what happened?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Are you going to say it’s all part of God’s plan?

utterance.speaker: Mrs Cooper
utterance.content: Good chance.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Then no, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Mrs Cooper
utterance.content: Well, honey, don’t send it back yet. Your sister’s married, and I’m not letting your brother give my grandmother’s ring to that whore he’s dating.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Wasn’t Mary Magdalene a woman of ill repute?

utterance.speaker: Mrs Cooper
utterance.content: When your idiot brother redeems mankind, he can date whoever he wants.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: I know it hurts now, but it’s gonna get better.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Everything’s gonna be okay.

utterance.speaker: Stuart
utterance.content: You’ve got so much to offer.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Stuart
utterance.content: Any man would be lucky to have you.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: That’s true.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: I just hope I did the right thing.

utterance.speaker: Stuart
utterance.content: I’m sure you did. Maybe that’s the problem, you always do the right thing. Maybe it’s time to do the wrong thing.

utterance.speaker: Amy
utterance.content: Like you’re doing right now?

utterance.speaker: Stuart
utterance.content: Exactly.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I asked you over and over if you were okay. Why would you go through with the wedding if you weren’t?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I thought I was okay, but it turns out I’m not.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Okay, listen, I may not have been entirely faithful, but you, you are not easy to lift.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Wow. Well, marriage must agree with you. Well, you are just glowing.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I’m not glowing. I’m upset.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well, whatever it is, it agrees with you.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon (outside)
utterance.content: Knock, knock, knock, Penny? Knock, knock, knock, Penny? Knock, knock, knock, Penny?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: What’s this?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Leonard told me what happened, so I took it upon myself to make you a hot beverage.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh. That’s so sweet of you.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Yeah. I know. Turns out, being sweet isn’t enough to keep a girl these days. I blame Madonna.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I’m sorry to hear about you and Amy.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well, I’m sorry about Leonard. Thought I raised him better than that.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: You know, it’s bad enough what happened, but then he tried to hide the fact that he sees her all the time at the university.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: He does? Who is it?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Some girl named Mandy.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Mandy Chao?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Oh, you don’t need to worry about her. She’s brilliant and attractive. She can do way better

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: That’s great.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Wait a minute. I know this may sound far fetched, but I’m on the market now. You know, if I dated Mandy, that would teach both Leonard and Amy a lesson.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: That’s ridiculous.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Oh, you’re right. I could never be with a woman whose self-esteem was so low she’d be with Leonard.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I’m with Leonard.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Yeah, I know. Forever. Who would have believed these things would happen to us?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Right? I can’t believe Amy actually went through with it.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Hang on. You knew that she was going to end it with me? Did you try and stop her?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I told her to be true to herself and do what makes her happy.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Do what makes her happy? She plays the harp and her car is paid for. How much happier can she be?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Okay, look, it’s not my fault that she thought you were a bad boyfriend.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I see. Well, I think I’ll be going.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Sheldon.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: No, no, no, no. We are done here. Would you mind opening the door and then angrily slamming it behind me?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Thank you. And slam it hard, because I am pretty steamed.

utterance.speaker: Howard (on phone)
utterance.content: All right, Leonard, hang in there. Talk to you tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: What happened? They just got married.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: I don’t know. It’s a mess. They had a huge fight in Vegas.

utterance.speaker: Bernadette
utterance.content: Think they’ll break up?

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: I don’t know. Sounds pretty bad. Penny’s back in her apartment all by herself.

utterance.speaker: Stuart
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Would you like to hear another reason why men are better than women?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Sure, let’s make it an even hundred.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You would never kiss me and make me say I love you and then break up with me.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I wouldn’t.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: And you know why? ‘Cause you’re a man. The champagne of genders.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Well, I may be a man, but I think I’m the one that screwed up on this one.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Yeah, well, and you admit it, like a man. All you hear women say is, I’ll just have a salad. You know? Where’s my lip gloss? I think this element should be called radium. That last one was Madame Curie.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I figured that out.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You know what? She was kind of an honorary man. She had a penis made of science.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Can’t believe I’m spending my wedding night with you.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Really? I never imagined it any other way.
